revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Viridian Forest |image = [[File:Viridian Forest.png]] |caption = A map of Viridian Forest. |tokens = 50 |location = North of Viridian City, on Route 2. }} '''Viridian Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 102 |- | Pikachu (Boss) || 510 |}
==Pokémon==
* Caterpie * Metapod * Weedle * Kakuna * Pidgey * Pidgeotto * Pikachu (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 43% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 43% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 14% |}
